EmailTemplate.name: Nov-Dec 2017 Edition.Nov-Dec 2017 Edition
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - Nov-Dec 2017 Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER Nov-Dec 2017 PRIMUS ELITE ADVANCED FEATURES CERTIFIED ON TWO ADDITIONAL AIRCRAFT Primus Elite® Advanced Features (PEAF) has now been certified on the Dassault F900 EX / C and Bombardier Global Express aircraft. PEAF increases crew situational awareness with the integration of synthetic vision with charts and maps, video capability and the XM® ground-based weather displayed on Primus Elite’s LCD flight displays.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/PrimusElite_AdvancedFeatures.html]]> Laseref VI Simplifies Pilots' Workload and Reduces Operational Costs
The LASEREF VI Micro Inertial Reference System is compliant with the new ADS-B requirements, simplifies pilot workload, and reduces weight power consumption by 30 percent... Learn more. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Laseref VI Brochure.pdf]]> Spare Parts When You Need Them Most
Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan is offering a new optional upgrade to ensure large business fleets are more quickly repaired and ready to fly in a shorter time... Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2017/november/honeywell-s-newest-avionics-protection-plan-option-stores-spare-parts-where-you-need-them-most]]> FMZ-2000 Software Version 6.1 Upgrade Is Required
FMS Software Version 6.1 has enhancements that will reduce flight time and reduce fuel burn and emissions. However, the upgrade is required. Operators who do not upgrade prior to Dec. 31, 2017... Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/cockpit-systems/fmz-2000-version-6-1-upgrade]]>.
